column6: While his cabal of villains attacked Spidey from all sides, weakening our favorite wall-crawler, the Chameleon sat back and waited. Now, it's time for him to make his move against the weakest member of Peter's circle: his Aunt May!! And what last trick does Mark Raxton (aka the Molten Man) have up his flaming sleeve?
column8: | writer:Roberto Aguirre-Sacasa | penciller (cover):Clayton Crain | inker:Scott Hanna | colorist:Dan Kemp | penciller:Angel Medina | letterer:Cory Petit
